dungeon_cell.name: Dungeon cell
dungeon_cell.description:
A weak light shines through a small barred window just below the ceiling.
You see the outlines of the few things in your cell.
There is a door north from you.
Dirty, half rotten straw is lying on the floor.

lower_cell.name: Another dungeon cell
lower_cell.description:
It is moist and dark, but a weak light shines through the small open trap door in the ceiling.
The hole in the ceiling is too high for you to climb back.
The cell door in the north seems very massive.

The cell is deserted and has not seen a cell dweller in a while.

corridor.name: Narrow corridor
corridor.description:
The opened cell door is to the south. The corridor stretches to the east and to the west, slightly curved.
You hear a faint noise from the west!
corridor.additional_description: There is a burning torch on a mount on the wall, it flickers and casts creepy shadows.

forward_corridor.name: Narrow and dirty corridor
forward_corridor.description:
Coming from the west, it stretches further to the east, leading to a staircase.
There is some debris on the floor, but it is too dark to see any details.

backward_corridor.name: Narrow, guarded corridor
backward_corridor.description: Coming from the east, it stretches further to the west, slightly curved.

hidden.description:
A narrow corridor.
It stretches further to the west. You are hidden behind the barrel.

staircase.name: Dark staircase
staircase.description: North from you, the steps lead up.

torch.description:
A staircase
The steps lead up to the north.
In a dark corner half way up the light of the torch reveals a small passage to the east.

latrine_room.name: Latrine room
latrine_room.description:
A small, smelly room, the latrine.
In the end of the room is a wooden board with a hole in it.

upper_corridor.name: Narrow corridor, 2nd floor
upper_corridor.description:
South from you, the stairs lead down.
The corridor stretches further to the west.
You hear voices from the west.

guard_room.name: Guard room
guard_room.description:
You manage to hide behind a ledge before anyone could see you.
You hear a fire cracking in a fireplace.

entrance_corridor.name: Entrance hall
entrance_corridor.description: The corridor from the east ends here. There is a big portal to the south.

outside.name: Outside world
outside.description: A meadow! Trees! Singing birds! You are back in the outside world.

straw.name: straw
straw.description: The straw is dirty, rotten and full with vermin. But underneath you see a trap door in the floor!
straw.error_portable:
While touching the rotten straw you feel an iron ring which belongs to a hidden trap door!
But it makes no sense to fill your pockets with the straw, so you leave it where it is.

bucket.name: wooden bucket
bucket.description:
A wooden bucket.
It appears to be used for... well you can imagine. No other facilities here.
bucket.error_portable: Trust me, you DON'T want to carry THAT around! It is nearly full with... you know.

empty.name: empty
empty.description:
A wooden bucket.
It appears to be used for... well you can imagine. No other facilities here.
It is now empty.

bed.name: bunk bed
bed.description:
A bunk bed. Comfortable as a wooden board. Maybe due to the fact that it IS a wooden board.
It is mounted on the wall.

trap_door.name: trap door
trap_door.description: After removing the straw, you can see a trap door in the floor.

open.name: open
open.description: You open the trap door with its large metal ring. The opening reveals a small corridor below your cell.

cell_door.name: cell door
cell_door.description: The door is very sturdy. As expected, it is locked.
cell_door.error_portable: I can't imagine a reason to carry around a door down here!

unlocked_cell_door.name: cell door
unlocked_cell_door.description: The door is very sturdy. Surprisingly, it is unlocked.
unlocked_cell_door.error_portable: Come on, why should you carry a cell door?

open.name: open
open.description: The massive cell door is open.

closed.name: closed
closed.description: The massive cell door is closed.

barred_window.name: barred window
barred_window.description: It is too high for you, you can't reach it!
barred_window.error_portable:
It is too high for you, you can't reach it!
Besides, carrying a window around? Seriously?

barrel.name: barrel
barrel.description: A large barrel, approx. half your height. It is very heavy, but you can't look inside because it is closed.

open.name: open
open.description: A large barrel, approx. half your height. The lid is open and you see that it is filled with water.

guard.name: guard
guard.description: A big, dim looking guard. Looks like he could eat you for breakfast.

unconscious.name: unconscious
unconscious.description:
A big, dim looking guard. But he is harmless now, due to his unconciousness.
It might be a good idea to search him.

small_guard.name: small guard
small_guard.description: A small, grim looking guard with a ferret face.

big_guard.name: big guard
big_guard.description: A hefty guard with broad shoulders.

stone.name: stone
stone.description: A stone the size of a fist.

custom_errors.throw: Leave it, you throw like a girl. Besides, where do you wanna throw it?

latrine.name: latrine
latrine.description:
Ugh, the cesspool of the latrine is not very deep but very full.
Maybe you can find something in there?

fireplace.name: fireplace
fireplace.description: An open fireplace, the fire is cracking and radiates a cosy warmth.

ring.name: ring
ring.description:
A golden ring.
It looks very valuable!

dirty.name: dirty
dirty.description:
A ring.
It is very dirty and should be cleaned.

portal.name: portal
portal.description: A large portal with two door leafs. The left one has a large keyhole. The doors are locked.

open.description: You open the left door leaf with the key.

merchant.name: merchant woman
merchant.description:
An old woman with a large backpack.
She appears to be a merchant.

start_event.name: Awake
start_event.description:
It begins as soon as you wake up, with a searing pain piercing your temples and spreading across your head.
Then comes the sickness, the dry mouth and the sudden panic -
all accompanied alongside that phrase, "never again".

As soon as you open your eyes you realize: This is no hangover.
You are not in your bedroom.
You have lost your memories of yesterday, the last thing you remember is...
well, you are not sure WHAT you remember.

empty_bucket.description:
You empty the bucket in your cell.
Not very wise from you!
The floor is now covered with what was in the bucket before.

open_cell_door.description:
You try to open the cell door, but it is locked.
You hear someone shout from the other side of the door:
- "Don't you dare breaking out!"

open_barred_window.description: The window is too high, you can't reach it!

empty_barrel.description: The barrel is too heavy for that!

get_torch.description:
The torch makes it easier to find your way. The dungeon down here is mostly dark.
But you will be seen immediately with the bright torch in your hands.

guard_trigger.description: You notice a big guard standing in a corner of the room. He doesn't look into your direction, yet.

hide_barrel.description: You duck and hide behind the barrel. The guard seems to have not yet noticed you.

open_barrel.description: You open the barrel. It is filled with water.

clean_ring.description: You clean the ring. It looks like it is pure gold!

drink_barrel.description: You drink some water from the barrel. Refreshing!

throw_stone_at_guard_hidden.description: You throw the stone at the guard. You hit him on his head and he sinks to the ground.

throw_stone_at_guard.description: You try to throw the stone. But the guard is quicker.

search_guard.description: The guard has a key chained on his belt.

arest.name: The guard arests you!
arest.description:
The guard points his sword into your direction. "You! Don't move!" he barks.

You stand still. He grabs your arm with his free hand and turns you around in a swift movement.
Afterwards he hits you with his sword handle on the back of your head.

Again, it gets dark around you when you loose consciousness...

arest_torch.description: The guard looks at your burning torch, baffled.

two_guards_trigger_eavedrop.description:
After a quick glance around the ledge you hear two guards talking to each other.
You can eavedrop some of their talk:
- "..But where did you loose it?"
- "I don't know, I still had the f*'$! ring this morning!
  Must have lost it somewhere.."

two_guards_arest.description:
Both guards turn around simultanously and attack you.
It all happens very quickly, you have no chance against them.
After getting hit on your head, you loose conscioiusness (again)...

staircase_torch.description: The light of the torch reveals a small passage to the east.

search_latrine.description:
Searching through fecies is no fun.
However, your fingers feel something small and solid.
It is a (albeit dirty) ring!
You manage to fetch it from the latrine.

open_portal.description:
Directly after opening the portal an old woman comes through the opening.
She does not wear the clothes of a guard but a large backpack, she appears to be a traveling merchant.
She says:
- "Who are you? You look like a prisoner.
  do you know a reason why I should not alarm the guards right away?"

merchant_ring.description:
You give her the ring you found.
She says:
- "Hmm. Ok boy, I keep my mouth shut. Now leave before I change my mind!"
She quickly disappears into the building.

merchant_ring_dirty.description:
You give her the dirty ring you found.
She says:
- "Oh boy, what will I do with this dirty, useless crap?"

merchant_alarm.description:
The old woman blocks your way with her large backpack.
She screams for help and before you manage to overwhelm her, two guards are running towards you.
They hit you on your head.
The last thing you think about before it gets dark around you is "not again!"

win_event.description: You managed to find out of the dungeon!

demo.name: Demo event to demonstrate the event system.
demo.comment: This comment is for describing this object, it is not displayed in the game.
demo.description: This is the demo event! Just for testing purposes...
